page.shortlink: api a5 assign user to groups function
page.description: Allows the administrator to add or drop a user from one or more groups. Group_names is a semi_colon (;) delimited list of groups.
page.syntax: L a5_assign_user_to_groups(C master_password ,C user_name ,C group_names [,C action ])

argument.name: master_password
argument.description: The master password for the database.

argument.name: group_names
argument.description: A semi_colon (;) delimited list of groups.

argument.name: action
argument.description:
Optional. Default = "add".
"add" = add user to groups
"drop" = remove user from groups

page.discussion: The A5_ASSIGN_USER_TO_GROUPS() function allows an administrator to add or drop a user from groups.
